function.name: dryingLevel_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the drying level of a dryer.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the drying level.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the drying level.

dryingLevel.description: The value to set as the drying level.
